name: To Victory
description:
This is a single player strategy management game.Base on a randomly generated map.It includes construction, trading, strategy, and management elements . Players need to make decisions to achieve the final victory.

Gameplay

1.Game Map: Different buildings will be randomly generated on the game map, and different types of buildings have different characteristics. Players need to start from their own base and occupy the final building step by step to win.
2.Random distribution: The number and type of buildings on the map are randomly generated, and players need to adjust their strategies based on the distribution of buildings in each game.
3.Construction simulation: The game includes various elements such as construction, trading, diplomacy, etc. Various events will also bring players different experiences.

[Important] If you have any suggestions about this game, please make sure to comment or email（ old_gamer@163.com ）Or let me know by commenting below the promotional video on Youtube, thank you!
